95a2: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras dra dang / lcir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs
95a3: par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur snyam ste dogs pa rnyed par 'gyung ngo / / dpa' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig tocan mya
95a4: ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/ / dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
95a5: 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum par 'gyur ba dang / sku g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma lhung ba gtong zhing / 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan
95a6: pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du/ bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom
95a7: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du/ bdud sdig te can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i
95a8: drung du mche bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du/

95b1: bdud sna ba tonan gan pa'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan// byang chub sems dpa' gang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe 'di shes rab kyi rol du phyin ma
95b2: ma yin nas the tshom dubyur pa de dag gi rlung du/ bdud sdig tonan gtso pa'i bsam pa sa nye bar 'ong // dag bro gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'adage ba'i ba shes pa nyin dang bras dngas dag ga
95b3: shes rab kyi pha rol du ljon pa zab mo 'di mi bris so/ / mthos pas mi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas/ de bzhin nyid dun na tan byed do/ dpa' bo byang chub sems
95b4: de la yang / bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/
95b5: dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig te can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa'/ dam pa'i chos ma yin
95b6: pa la bsngags brjod na/ de la bdug sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni pa dag gi thogs yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa sla ba
95b7: 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las
95b8: gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni/ de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang / bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga'

96a1: po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'aja lta bul bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub se byas dpa' gang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes
96a2: pha rol tu ldan pan shin tu zab de/ / khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos las ci zhig bya ba sgoms pa dang / bzung ba dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhag bya/
96a3: kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/ khyod kyis la rnyed re san ces zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang / bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gzo byang chub sems
96a4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyes pa myed cing nga ni smin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ / da ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
96a5: la spyang pa'o/ / nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'o// ra ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'o// khyod ni skyed pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyong
96a6: mayin no/ / khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khen
96a7: bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin do/ / khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang / bdud sdig ta ma
96a8: gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems skyed na dga' bo de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / nyams bde dang

96b1: rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang / bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
96b2: brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa kun du grags par gyur na/ de'i ming brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing / bdag stong
96b3: gzhan smod la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med par rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa
96b4: de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing / bdag stong / gzhan smod de/ 'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar/ khyod byang chub sems
96b5: dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo / / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par mi snang nge zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par rjod cing smong na de la/ bdud sdig
96b6: to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas na stong par mi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi rigs kyi yul yang shin du 'phel
96b7: bar 'gyu re re zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang / mnyan pa dang / ying
96b8: chos par bya bar sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam/ mthong na 'thun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam/ mthong nas 'thun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin nyid du slob pa'i// de bzhin

97a1: nyid du slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ga
97a2: dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi
97a3: skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin du 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can
97a4: dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing / de ni mchog
97a5: tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams
97a6: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems
97a7: can dmyal ba'i lam mo/ / de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo// de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin nosnyam du sems par 'gyur ro//
97a8: dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dun de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du

97b1: sems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir de na
97b2: 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
97b3: rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dpa' zhing / spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bskrun pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung
97b4: bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dun gal te des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na/ ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'tha
97b5: cing rtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing mtshang 'dra bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/ 'on
97b6: te ma lags kyis/ bskul pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
97b7: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams langs 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dga' bo de ba gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /
97b8: 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan du rjod pa dang / 'thabs rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pa byas nas phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin cing mkhon du bzung ste gnas na/ dga' bo gang

98a1: zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smras/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su mi gtong zhen/ gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go cha bgo par bya'o// dga' bo byang chu
98a2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing brtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang madrad par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par
98a3: thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smras pa la/ phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag
98a4: gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir zlogs pa ni/ mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o// bdag gis glen pa dang / lkug pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o// sems can
98a5: 'di dag ni/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pazla bar bya dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su
98a6: byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
98a7: sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can klags la zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
98a8: dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o/ / de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o// 'dug par mi bya'o// gal te 'dug na yang des

98b1: su la yang ga rjod sems su mi bya/ 'khrug par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la pi tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
98b2: dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o// dga' bos gsol
98b3: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di la
98b4: dper na ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs
98b5: gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/ / 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
98b6: phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
98b7: stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid da
98b8: do ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad pa stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngob

99a1: nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
99a2: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bdan pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa
99a3: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
99a4: thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
99a5: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab
99a6: par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ / des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 'di na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing / rnam pa thams
99a7: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya yi/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
99a8: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no//

99b1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyis brgya ba'i bcu lnga pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyang rlabs pas
99b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nang
99b3: stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyin
99b4: stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor
99b5: chen po stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do//
99b6: rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnya
99b7: pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
99b8: dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub

100a1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor chos thams cad spong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnapa pa'id do// rab 'byor ba
100a2: stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mam pa nyid do// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos
100a3: po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byong
100a4: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni tsher rabs stong / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis spong
100a5: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis skong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas song // maM ga ni mig gis stong / rna ba ni rnabs snang / sA ni smras spong / lce ni ldes stong / lus ni lus kyis so/ yid ni yid kyis stong /
100a6: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / sgra ni sgras stong / dri ni dris stong / ron ras stong / reg ni reg gis stong / chos ni chos kyis stong // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas spyod/ rna ba'i rnam pa
100a7: shes pa ni zhis pa shes pas stong / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sa rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas spong / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas
100a8: stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te rag/

100b1: pa ni pA'i 'dus te reg pam song / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ me'i 'dus te dreg pas slong / lus kyi dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas dong // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'i/ yid kyi 'dras ti gapas pang /
100b2: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rten byas tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi tshor bas dang /
100b3: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
100b4: rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rabs stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rabs skong / sa'i khams ni/ sa'i khams
100b5: kyis stong / chu'i khams ni/ tshul khams kyis stong / me'i khams ni/ me'i khams kyis song / rlung gi khams ni/ rlung gi khams kyis skong/ nam mkha' khams na nam mkha'i khams kyis stong / rnam
100b6: par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong / / ma rig pa ni ma rig pas song // 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis srong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas skong / med dang gzugs rnam
100b7: rang gzugs kyis song / skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis skong/ reg pa ni reg pas stong / tsher ba ni tshong bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas stong / len pa ni len pas song / sred pa ni sred pas stong
100b8: ba ni skye bas stong / rga shi ni rga shis stong // sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pas ste

101a1: ni/ bzod par pha rol du phyin pas stong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/
101a2: da stong / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas skyeng/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni bya stong pa nyid kyis
101a3: rkang pa nyid snang pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa
101a4: sa stong / sa stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong
101a5: ste ga pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin
101a6: nyid kyis stong / chos sems cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi
101a7: dmags pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/
101a8: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo cad stong pa nyid kyis stong // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong

101b1: ra sa ni tshul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong / stobs rnamapa ni stobs rnams kyis stong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi
101b2: yin la da byas ya lam kyis stong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis slong/ tshad med
101b3: pa rnams ni rang med pa rnams kyis steng / gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong / rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis
101b4: stong pa mtha sa gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni rnam
101b5: par thang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong / mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong
101b6: gzungs rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rna
101b7: kyis rnas so yang dag par dag pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong / snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi
101b8: chos ma 'das pa rnams kyis stong / rkan tu 'gas pa'i 'bras pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bram ze ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus steng / phyir ma

102a1: 'ba' 'bras dran par mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong / rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ro lam bya
102a2: rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor 'ang ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'am pa
102a3: nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
102a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
102a5: slang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs ma
102a6: skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba
102a7: 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
102a8: pa lags sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

102b1: du slob pa la sum/ shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bsti bya'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'gas pa rabakyi pa'i srang du slob na
102b2: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slab pa lags sam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed pas par bgyi ba'i sngar
102b3: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de slob pa lags sam/ 'dra
102b4: byed 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
102b5: sam/ rnam par shes pa shes par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
102b6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar
102b7: bgyi ba'i slad du stob narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam mig 'dod
102b8: rtags dang bral bar bgyi bor skad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du smod na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags

103a1: 8mams so par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnab pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
103a2: sam/ rnab 'der chags dang dral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i sang du sloban rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa
103a3: rna ba ma sa nga slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snabs pa rabagyi ba'i slang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'dod chags dang cwa
103a4: bar bgyi ba'i slad du snang na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sA 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna mi skye bar bgyi
103a5: ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lcebs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
103a6: slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
103a7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/
103a8: lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/

103b1: lus mi se pa sbe na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod chags
103b2: dang bral ba srad du na rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid mi skye bar
103b3: bgyi ba'i sre de na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ gzugs 'dod chags
103b4: dang bral ba gyu pa slad du sngo ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bkyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs
103b5: mi skye bar bkyi ba'i slad du skye ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'dod chags dang /
103b6: bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sgrib na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra mi skye bar bgyi
103b7: pa'i slad du slo ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
103b8: slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na

104a1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa ma/ / ro 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sum/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar brdzi
104a2: pa'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ ro mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang
104a3: du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
104a4: ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg mi skye bar bgyi ba'i
104a5: sradang du slobar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar
104a6: bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos mi skye bar bgyi ba'i
104a7: slang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rdib tham cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
104a8: 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

104b1: slob pa lags su lamig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
104b2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i
104b3: rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bor bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
104b4: slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
104b5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma skye bar
104b6: bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce bo rnam
104b7: par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
104b8: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i

105a1: dang slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
105a2: ba pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
105a3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
105a4: 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
105a5: pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
105a6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sar/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar rabagyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg
105a7: pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
105a8: sal/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad

105b1: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du
105b2: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod
105b3: chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
105b4: sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
105b5: nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad
105b6: du slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
105b7: bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
105b8: lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams

106a1: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags
106a2: dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
106a3: sa sam/ yid kyi 'das te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du
106a4: slobar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
106a5: sa sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
106a6: ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
106a7: slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen
106a8: gyis tshor ba 'gag par bkri ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad

106b1: mkhyen pa nyid sob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
106b2: 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
106b3: pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
106b4: pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slo bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
106b5: nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
106b6: mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du so di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor babs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
106b7: slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
106b8: kyis tshar ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad

107a1: gas sapa ya ka 'dus te rag pa'i rgyan kyis tsho babs par bgyi pabasra nga slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid duslab pa lags sam/ yang kyi 'das te
107a2: nyan ces rang byas dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te dag pa'i chen kyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du tsho na
107a3: dam pa thams cad mtha pa nyid slob pa lags sa pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho rab mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad pa khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khangs
107a4: pas par bgyi ba'i slar du sapa na rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar ba bya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa pa/
107a5: sa'i khams 'gag par babya ba'i snang du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams maM ska bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na ram pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
107a6: ma/ tshwa'i khams phas par 'gro ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chu'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
107a7: sam/ chu 'khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i skad du slob nan pa pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sar// chu'i khams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa
107a8: ma'i khams pas par bgyi pa'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sapa/ me'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob zab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags

113b7: lag bdun pas par brtse ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdan 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mabyar

114a1: slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
114a2: lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
114a3: 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
114a4: slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhipas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi bar
114a5: slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags
114a6: bde bden pa bzhi ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi pas bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
114a7: lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i skad du sra ba na rnam pa
114a8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhizas par bgyi bar slad du

114b1: slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'did chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i srad du slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'ag/
114b2: par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lagasas pa/ gzugs med pa'i/
114b3: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i skad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa logs sa pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'di de chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i skad du
114b4: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
114b5: gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa bzhi ma skye bar bgyi ba'i srad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
114b6: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'gag par bgyi
114b7: ba'i srang du skyobar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis
114b8: gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral

115a1: pa spang du slobar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bgro ba'i srang du slob na rnam pa thams cad
115a2: dus pa pa lags sa pa/ bzar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i
115a3: bar pa med padang smon pa med pabs par bgyi ba'i skang du slobar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang brtan pa med pa da
115a4: pa med pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bge ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa med pa dang ston pa med pa 'gag
115a5: par bkye ba'i srad smra sa narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
115a6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid daslob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags som/ mngon par shes pa rnams
115a7: 'ad lags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad bslob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
115a8: sdo pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rna par bgyi ba'i slad du sdong

115b1: nadam pa thams dang pakhor pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
115b2: ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i sdang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams pa skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
115b3: pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar
115b4: bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
115b5: gzungs kyi sgo rnams me skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slobar rnam pa
115b6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
115b7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du
115b8: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa

116a1: bzhi 'dod dgas dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sapa/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
116a2: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i
116a3: slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
116a4: sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
116a5: rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral
116a6: bar bge ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje
116a7: po mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
116a8: pa nyid du slob pa lags sa ma/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

116b1: slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slon pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi
116b2: skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bubs pa rab kyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
116b3: sa pa/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du
116b4: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig
116b5: phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
116b6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir
116b7: 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
116b8: pa nyid du slob pa la gos sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

117a1: 'gab par rabagyi ba'i slang du slob du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sapa/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
117a2: bar du slo pa lagasas pa/ dgra bcom pa nyid pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags saso// dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
117a3: ba'i slang du slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
117a4: dgra bcom pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du so
117a5: pa lags sam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
117a6: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad
117a7: du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
117a8: legs sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad

117b1: du slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pas pa rabakyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
117b2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod chag pa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag par bgyi
117b3: ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
117b4: lags sam/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyis brgya bzhi bcu drag pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te gnas
117b5: brtan rab 'byor gyis gang 'di skad du/ gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
117b6: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
117b7: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshong pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
117b8: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob

118a1: 'du shes zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du so/
118a2: pa/ 'dugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
118a3: 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed
118a4: 'ab par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa zad par
118a5: bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par
118a6: shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig zad
118a7: par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig 'gag par bya ba'i
118a8: byang slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams

118b1: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam nub 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
118b2: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
118b3: nam/ sna 'bod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna mi skye
118b4: bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lto 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
118b5: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce mo skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
118b6: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
118b7: pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
118b8: yin nam/ yid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

119a1: yid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs//
119a2: zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin napa/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
119a3: gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra zad par
119a4: bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
119a5: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
119a6: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yid nam/ dri 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
119a7: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
119a8: pa yin nam/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

119b1: slob pa yin nam/ ro ma skye ba dbya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
119b2: reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i par slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg
119b3: mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ches 'dod chags dang /
119b4: bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ra rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos mi skye bar bya/
119b5: ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam/
119b6: par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
119b7: nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
119b8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gag/

120a1: par bya ba'i pi sa pad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
120a2: snga rnam par shes zad par bya ba'i phyir spro bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snga'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa
120a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snga'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i
120a4: par spro ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lho'i rnam
120a5: parags pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
120a6: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ram/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i
120a7: phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na mo/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
120a8: lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin napa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

120b1: nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob
120b2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi smra ba
120b3: bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te
120b4: reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i byar slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
120b5: du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
120b6: nga mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag/
120b7: par bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te/
120b8: reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

121a1: slob pa yin na / sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nar// sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
121a2: la bcad la len pa nyid de slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral
121a3: bar bya ba'i phyir rlob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus
121a4: te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cod mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
121a5: yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te dag pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na
121a6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par
121a7: bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'das te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
121a8: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

121b1: slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
121b2: 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams ca
121b3: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namo// rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
121b4: ba'i tsher ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
121b5: mkhan pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las kyang
121b6: ba'atsho rab ma skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
121b7: slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las zung ba'i
121b8: tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las blang ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

122a1: slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher
122a2: ba'adod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor rab 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
122a3: pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshed//
122a4: ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
122a5: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
122a6: byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
122a7: po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
122a8: pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe rab mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa

122b1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ram/ sa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sngam
122b2: na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rlob pa yin dam/ sa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yid nam/ sa'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob
122b3: na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
122b4: phyir slob na rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams mi skye bar
122b5: bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ me'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ me'i khams 'dong
122b6: tshigs dang brel bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ me'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
122b7: me'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sle bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
122b8: rlung gi khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob da rnam pa thams cad pakhyed pa

123a1: nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
123a2: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'o khams 'gag
123a3: bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i
123a4: khams zad par bya pa'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
123a5: nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
123a6: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
123a7: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
123a8: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slo ba na 'as pa thams

123b1: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ 'du byed 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
123b2: pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
123b3: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
123b4: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ming dang gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ming dang gzigs 'dod chags
123b5: dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ming dang gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
123b6: ming dang gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched drug zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
123b7: se mched drug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched drug 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
123b8: slob pa yin nam/ skye mched drug mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namo/ reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa

124a1: yin nam/ / reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
124a2: mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tsher ba zad par bya ba'i phyir sloza na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
124a3: pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'dod chagaso dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
